resources.string: The current pack selected is locked. Unlock this pack for 200 Jewels?
Unable to connect to Google Play Store. Please check your connection and try again.
Your current Google Play Store account has no purchases.
Type Passive: Activated automatically whenever the condition is fulfilled. You cannot activate this spell manually.
Type Active: During battle, you must manually click this Spell to activate its effect. Each Active Spell can only be used once in the entire battle.
Choose 4 spells to bring into battle
Multiplayer requires Google Play Game Service.\nPlease sign in to your Google Play Game Service account.
Are you sure you want to exit the game?
Your opponent has requested for a rematch. Accept the challenge?
Sends your current word to your opponents and skips it, without breaking your streak. Your opponents will be guessing this word on their next question.
If I can’t give an answer, can you?
Rotates your opponents\' words 90 degrees to the right.
Is your head tilted or are you tilted?
Jumbles your opponents\' words, while keeping the first and last alphabet of each word intact.
If You Can Raed Tihs, You Msut Be Rlleay Srmat.
Hexes your opponents! For each word in the definition, there is a 50% chance that a letter in the word is replaced with the hex (#) key.
Start off each question with the first 3 letters of the answer given. This spell has no effect if the answer has 3 or less letters. Affects only yourself.
With the power of the Eye, nothing can stop me from scoring consecutively!
Reverses a Spell targeted at you back at the caster.
Ha! Back to you! Have a taste of your own medicine!
Prevents anyone from casting any Active Spell. Passive spells will remain in effect.
Negate any Spell targeted at you.
See no evil, hear no evil!
Condition: After you have been targeted by 2 Spells consecutively, the next Spell targeted at you is negated.
Any scores that your gained will be doubled. Affects you only.
Two times the scores, two times the fun!
Condition: Activated only if you are currently in the last place.
Guess the word correctly and score points!
The higher the Streaks, the more points you earn! Score Streaks by consecutively answering correctly.
Using Hint will halved the score earned if you answered correctly. Skip will break your Streak and proceed to next question.
Play with up to 8 Players in Multiplayer Mode
Cast spells to gain advantages or cause disruptions to opponents. Spells only affect those whose current position is higher than you.
Collect Jewels and unlock interesting Packs! Challenge your friends with the newly unlocked Packs.
Start playing the game and learn some interesting words and facts along the way!
Sign in to your Google Play Game Service account to view Achievements

We use Firebase Analytics by Google, which may collect information that may include, but not limited to, user's date of install, frequency of use, functionality of app used, country, etc, for used in the following circumstances: 

To have a better understanding of user's demographic 
To better enhance the current product by understanding user's origin and functionality of app used 

We use Fabric Crashlytics by Google to collect Crash Reports from users when the app crashed. The Crash Report sent to us may include your device model, Android Version, and the part of the code where the crash occurs. No part of this Crash Reports can directly identify an individual personally.
Is this game available on iOS?
This game is currently only available on Android. We have no plan for an iOS release yet.

Yes. You will have permanent access to Remove Ads feature upon purchase, even if you change phone. As long as you use the same Google account, you can click on \"Restore your Purchase\" in the Shop, and have your previous purchase restored.
I have purchased the Remove Ads, but it was not reflected.

This can happen if you delete the game and reinstall it, or install it on another device. In any case, you can always click on \"Restore your purchase\" and have your previous purchase restored, as long as you are using the same Google account. If this does not work, try to reinstall the app, and click on \"Restore your purchase\" again in the Shop.
How do I save my progress?
Sign in to your Google Play Game Service account to automatically store your progress. Your Jewels and the Packs unlocked will all be link to your Google account.
You can play Single Player Mode offline. However, an internet connection is required to play Multiplayer Mode.
Is this game available in other languages?
Currently, only English language is supported.
I used a spell, but it is not working?
Spells only target those players whose scores are higher than you. For players whose scores are lower than you, your spell will not affect them.

We require all users who downloaded and use this app to be above the age of 13. This is to be in line with COPPA and policies from third party network such as Facebook Audience Network and Google Admob when serving Ads, as well as Firebase Analytics from Google which may collect information from users.
How can I manage or turn off In-app-purchase?

This game is free to download and play, but contains In-app-purchases:

		-Remove Ads
		-Purchasing Jewels

These purchases are never required to play the game, but can be used to enhance the gameplay. In-app-purchase are paid for with real money, and are always labeled as such. You can easily manage the ability to make in-app-purchase, adjust password protection settings, or disable in-app-purchase entirely. To do so, open Google Playstore on your device, and go to 'User controls' section in the Playstore Settings page. This can prevent your child from making unintentional in-app-purchase.

We do not handle the In-app-purchase transactions. The payment transactions themselves are completed through Google Play via your personal email address associated with that account. Receipts for these transactions are emailed to you by Google.\n\nTherefore, we do not have access to any of your personal and credit card information, as the transaction are completed through Google Play.

We are here to help! You can read through our FAQ page which answers some of the frequently asked questions. For further assistance, you can contact us at contact@ninebitstudio.com. We will be happy to hear from you!
A sample game that tests your ability to click a button. Can you click faster than your friends? Only one way to find out! To play this game with friends, you must sign in with Google.
Invite friends to play a game.
See who is inviting you right now.
Click the button as fast as you can!
An error occurred while starting the game. Please try again.
is challenging you to a game!
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
Anyone you invite must be a trusted tester
This rematch has already been started!
This match has locally-modified data. This operation cannot be performed until the match is sent to the server.
